name: FPV Drone Simulator
description:
This FPV Drone Simulator is especially designed for practicing your drone flying skills! Fly in different environments. Choose 'free ride' or 'fantasy forest'. Flying ingame works best with a dual stick controller, otherwise a keyboard and mouse will do.

Key features:
  • focus on realistic physics
  • realistic flight mechanics
  • continuous development

We would love to receive feedback on our drone race simulator and don't forget any wishes your want us to implement.
This is by no means an end product, so be gentle please.
